entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
